description:
The Ultimate Sports Entertainment Platform

DAZN is the only truly global pure-play sports entertainment platform. We uniquely integrate the entire fan experience for fans to watch, play, and socialize, all in one place.

Watch Anytime, Anywhere.
Experience sports like never before. Stream your favourite events live or on demand, on any device, from anywhere in the world. DAZN delivers the game to you, wherever you are.

Play in FanZone and Beyond
Dive into the action with FanZone. Chat live, send reactions, and connect with fellow fans in real-time. It’s your front-row seat to the heart of the game.

Connect with Fans
Join the community. Chat with fans, share your passion, and celebrate every victory together. On DAZN, every game is a social event.

DAZN brings you the ultimate sports streaming experience with a world of content available anytime, anywhere:

• Dive into the “Home of Boxing”, featuring top events, schedules, fighter profiles, and exclusive content, including Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship (BKFC).
• Stay up-to-date with the “Schedule” feature, setting alerts for your favourite games across sports like American Football, Basketball, and Tennis.
• Navigate effortlessly with the new sub-navigation bar to quickly access your favourite competitions like Serie A. 
• Get real-time “Stats and Scores” for all games, including Men’s Football, the National League, and major tournaments like the NFL Game Pass and Courtside 1891.
• Explore full “Fight Cards” for boxing and MMA events, including the Professional Fighters League (PFL), and revisit past rounds with a single click.
• Engage with fans in the “FanZone” by cheering, chatting, sending reactions, and participating in polls.
• Manage your account with ease using the updated profile section.
• Browse and watch a variety of live channels with the EPG for live channels feature, including content from Red Bull TV, Padel TIME TV, and thrilling events like Riyadh Season.

DAZN holds the world’s largest portfolio of sports broadcasting rights, including:
• History-making fights from Matchroom Promotions, Queensbury, Golden Boy Promotions, and BKFC.
• Exclusive access to NFL Game Pass, bringing every game of the NFL.
• European football including Serie A and National League.
• NHL.TV: Experience every game from every team, live and on demand all season long. The world’s best hockey, all in one place.
• All the action from the NCAA College Football season.
• Basketball action, including Courtside 1891.
• The best of live Women’s Football, including Liga F, NWSL, and Frauen-Bundesliga.
• Exciting MMA content from the Professional Fighters League (PFL), Naciones MMA, and more.
• Unique sports like Padel, global tournaments in Tennis, and diverse events like Riyadh Season.
• Over 10 linear TV channels on our platform with 24/7 content, including Red Bull TV, Matchroom Snooker, Lacrosse TV, and more.
• A rich library of video-on-demand (VOD) content, including sports documentaries, features, and shows.

DAZN is your gateway to sports, bringing you closer to the action than ever before.

Terms of Use https://www.dazn.com/en-US/help/articles/pp-tcs-all
Privacy Policy: https://www.dazn.com/en-US/help/articles/pp-tcs-all

description:
****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

Up your sports fandom with the Bleacher Report app – fast sports alerts, sports scores, & exclusive content covering your favorite teams. Beyond scores & sports news, the B/R app is the destination to watch the next voices in sports news & culture with exclusive Bleacher Report shows & live content. Scroll through news and updates from your favorite teams with the B/R app.

Sports news, shows, live sports scores, stats, & epic highlights of your favorite sports & teams. Get sports news alerts instantly, as stories break across the NBA, NFL news, MLB, WNBA, NHL, MLS soccer, college sports like NCAA football & all-world soccer teams from La Liga, Bundesliga & more. Stay current on the college sports news you love.

Get sports news alerts & flash notifications on the latest rumors, trades, sports news, stats, predictions & breaking stories for all the sports you love: NBA scores, NHL alerts, NFL news, MLB highlights, WNBA, MLS, NCAA football, & more.

Be a fantasy football champion with instant NFL news alerts, injury updates, stats & sports scores for your fantasy basketball team or fantasy football team to stay ahead of your competition; Fantasy football and all sports starts with Bleacher Report. Fantasy football news when you need it.

Pick your favorite teams, & instantly get the latest sports news, alerts, sport scores, & more personalized stats through a singular sports app designed for you! Sports stats and sports news for all sports!

NFL News Alerts, Scores & Updates
• NFL News & Updates instantly: Stay up to date on the latest NFL football news, trades, cuts & signings from the NFL season. Get a leg up on the fantasy football competition!
• Follow your team’s every move with the latest NFL news & NFL highlights for fantasy football or for fandom!
• Get all the NFL news, stats, & scores, everything your fantasy football team needs to dominate

NBA Alerts, NBA Highlights, Basketball Stats, & News
• Follow the season with live NBA Scores
• Never miss a moment with the latest NBA news and updates
• Sports News: Exclusive NBA updates, basketball stats, League articles, & rankings
• Never miss a game of your favorite team with live NBA scores & plays
• Instant NBA highlights from your favorite teams

Football: MLS, UEFA, La Liga, Premier League & Bundesliga
• Get the latest football news, scores & sports alerts for your teams & players
• Live scores & breaking news for MLS, Premier League, UEFA Champions League, Europa League, La Liga & Bundesliga matches

MLB Scores, Alerts & News
• Never miss a moment from the postseason with live MLB scores
• Keep track of all the latest updates with instant MLB Alerts during the off-season

NHL Alerts, News, and Stats.
• Start the NHL season right with instant alerts and developing stories
• Keep up with the latest NHL storylines, expert analysis & more

NCAA College Sports
• College Football season is here - stay on top of all NCAA college football news and action.
• From college to pro, all the college sports you love in one sports app
• NCAA football scores & stats for every team
• College football news: Stay up to date on the latest NCAA football transfers, hires, & more during the off-season

Fan easier, fan better & fan faster with Bleacher Report with instant sports news alerts, fantasy football news & exclusive coverage on all your favorite NBA scores, NFL news, MLB highlights, WNBA, NHL, MLS, all-world soccer teams, and college Sports like NCAA football! All sports stats in one place!

Find out why millions of sports fans prefer theScore, with full scores, news, data of NFL, NBA, NCAA, MLB, NHL, English Premier League Soccer, La Liga Soccer, Champions League Soccer, and every major league and competition!

theScore delivers real-time scoring updates and alerts, breaking news, the deepest in-game stats, videos, and social content. theScore is fast, comprehensive, and super simple to use:

*Favourites - This is YOUR personalized feed. All the content you care about from your favourite teams, players and leagues. Just tap ‘Manage’ to add, delete or reorder your favourites. Set-up notifications so you’ll never miss a key moment!

*Scores - A live view of every game. Every score at a glance, updated in real-time. Just tap the matchup for detailed box scores, including live player data, odds, news and multimedia.

*Chat & Messaging - Who doesn’t like talking sports? Check out our cool chat and messaging features, helping you connect with other fans around the games and content you love. Public Chat is available in every matchup page, while you can also set-up group messaging with friends and family or just chat 1-1 too through the 'Messaging' icon found in the top right of the screen.

*Discover - Uncover the biggest social stories and multimedia that’s got sports fans talking! This is where you’ll find Russ’ latest swag or the sick dunk that’s going viral. 

*News - Get updated on the top headlines in an instant from across all sports, or tap the league you want at the top of the page to dive deeper.

*Leagues - Check out the latest news, scores, standings, and leaders for the sport you care about. Customize by tapping ‘Manage’ to reorder or even delete the sports you don’t care about. 

theScore offers deep coverage from every major league and competition, including:

- Football (NFL Football, NCAA Football and CFL Football, regular season and playoffs)
- Baseball (College World Series and MLB Baseball, season play and playoffs)
- Basketball (NBA Basketball, WNBA Basketball, NCAA Basketball - including NCAA Men’s Basketball Tournament and playoffs)
- Hockey (NHL Hockey, IIHF WJHC - World Junior Hockey Championship, NCAA Frozen Four) 
- Soccer (Premier League Soccer, Champions League, FIFA World Cup, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, MLS, FA Cup, League Cup, Europa League, Ligue 1, Coppa Italia, Copa Del Rey and Liga MX, UEFA European Championships) 
- Golf (PGA, LPGA, Ryder Cup, European Tour, Web.com Tour)
- Tennis (ATP, WTA), with the US Open coming in August
- Mixed Martial Arts (MMA: UFC and Bellator)
- Auto Racing (NASCAR Sprint Cup, Formula 1)
- Lacrosse (NLL)

For more information and other apps visit: http://scoremediaandgaming.com.

Need help, have feedback or want to request a new feature? Contact us via the Settings menu or email us via support@thescore.com. You can also chat to us on Twitter via @theScoreHelp.
-- 
We are affiliated with theScore.com
Privacy Policy: http://www.thescore.com/pages/privacy
Terms of Use: http://www.thescore.com/pages/terms

The DiverLog+ for mobile app is the premier full-featured dive log application. DiverLog+ is the Official App for Bluetooth Smart dive computers made by the following manufacturers: AQUALUNG, APEKS, HUISH/OCEANIC, SHERWOOD.

FEATURES 
- View, edit, and manage your DC dive detail data 
- Search dives based on location, dive type, buddies, many more 
- View, edit and manage your favorite dive spots and locations 
- View, edit and manage your dive gear, buddies 
- Keep track of personal data including medical and certification information 
- Upload slates, MY INFO, GPS Location to Dive Computer (DSX only)
- Add photos, Youtube video links to dives, and remember those fun times 
- Social sharing features 
- Synchronize with DiverLog application for desktop, laptop, and mobiles devices
- Download dive data from Dive Computer, upload your desired settings to Dive Computer, update firmware to Dive Computer using Bluetooth Smart (currently supports BEACON, CALM-ACT, DSX, i200C, i300C, i330R, i330R Console, i470TC, i550C, i750TC, i770R, GEO 4.0, GEO AIR, PROPLUS 4.0, PROPLUS X, SAGE, VEO 4.0, WISDOM 4.0)
- Much more ... 

SUMMARY 
DiverLog+ allows you to view, edit, and manage your dives easily. 

The dive detail section gives you all the information you need, including dive data, location and dive site information, tank and buddy information, gear bag, and more. Add your diving buddies and keep your personal certification and medical information on hand at all times. View your dive profile in full screen view. Add and manage your gear with easy entry forms. DiverLog+ offers you simple search methods to find your dives .. search by location, dive site, and even which computer you used! ...See all your dives on the world map, a unique feature we call your dive activity map! You can even keep track of your personal information, including medical and certification info. You can now sync your dives with the DiveCloud online dive data backup system so you never lose your dives, and always have them available, wherever you are! Connect with our developers by posting in the forum, or contact by email at the support website: https://ediverlog.com

Prepare for fishing trip and find the best fishing times using solunar data, tide prediction, marine and weather forecast.

Fishing Points app enables you to save and find your favourite fishing and hunting locations, spots, trotlines and trolling paths. Suitable for saltwater anglers (inshore or offshore fishing at open seas and oceans) and freshwater anglers (lakes, rivers) applying various fishing techniques fly fishing, bass fishing, boat fishing, kayak fishing, ice fishing.

Know your depths, fish smarter, find and catch more with worldwide nautical charts.

Create a fishing log and save the details of every catch (photos, weight, length). Weather, sun, moon, marine, waves and tide information are added automatically.

FIND YOUR LOCATIONS
• Save fishing locations, hotspots, waypoints with 40+ new markers and 10 colours to choose from
• Record trolling paths and trotlines
• Get information and quickly locate more than 50.000 boat ramps worldwide
• Find saved locations with GPS
• Worldwide nautical charts
• Measure distances
• Set anchor location, monitor your movements and get alerted if you exceed allowed distance

FORECAST
• Daily fish activity forecast
• Best fishing times calendar
• Feeding times (major and minor times)

MARINE FORECAST
• Hourly waves forecast (waves, swell, wind waves)
• Sea temperature (SST)
• Sea currents

WEATHER & TIDES
• Current weather conditions and hourly forecast
• Wind forecast
• Severe weather alerts
• Tide prediction charts
• Barometer and hourly air pressure data
• Rain & Clouds Radar

RIVER DATA 
• Current water levels & flows for 35k+ river stations

SOLUNAR DATA
• Sunrise and sunset times
• Sun positions
• Moonrise and moonset times
• Moon positions
• Moon phases
• Almanac

SYNC DATA
• Access your saved data across all your computer and mobile devices.
• Use Webapp to plan and analyze fishing trips on your computer. Try Webapp on https://web.fishingpoints.app

FISHING LOG
• Save catches and create fishing log
• Share catch photos

SHARE
• Import kmz or gpx files from gps devices or other apps
• Share your locations with friends

Note: App uses your location for navigation, path recording and weather forecast. Continued use of GPS running in the background when navigating or recording paths can dramatically decrease battery life.


The download and usage of Fishing Points App is free of charge. Upgrade to Premium version is available on a yearly or / and monthly subscription basis (price may vary between locations). Should you choose to upgrade to Premium version, payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription renews automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off in your Account Settings in iTunes after purchase. Once purchased, the current period cannot be canceled. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.

Privacy policy: https://fishingpoints.app/privacy
Terms of Use: https://fishingpoints.app/terms

The official Jude Bellingham app has arrived.  
Step into the world of Jude Bellingham like never before with his brand-new, free official app.  

Whether you're a lifelong fan or just discovering Jude’s journey, this app brings you exclusive behind-the-scenes content, real-time match updates, and in-game stats straight from the pitch.  

Key features: 
•	Exclusive content – Access behind-the-scenes footage of Jude’s life away from the spotlight.  
•	Matches - Receive real-time match updates, Jude’s upcoming fixtures and in-game stats. 
•	Partnerships – Discover Jude’s latest brand collabs and shop his official merchandise all in one place. 
•	Videos – View interviews, training clips and personal moments you won’t find anywhere else. 
•	Jude’s Journey – Relive the highlights, key milestones and unforgettable moments of Jude’s career so far. 
•	Multi-language – Enjoy a seamless experience in your preferred language – choose from English, French, German, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese. 

Wherever you are in the world, the Jude Bellingham app puts you at the heart of his story.  

Download now and stay connected to every moment.

Eternity is an advanced esports app that offers a comprehensive platform for gamers, enthusiasts, and professionals to connect, compete, and stay informed about the latest news, tournaments, and gameplay strategies.

Football is back! Keep up with the season wherever you go with the official app of the NFL.  

GET CLOSER TO THE ACTION:  
- Make the NFL app your central hub for game day and access available NFL content in one place.  
- Get up-to-the-minute scoring, in-game highlights and drive charts to track every play. 
- Go deeper into the game with breaking news, key stories, and insider analysis. 
- Stay connected with the NFL Channel and get FREE NFL content 24/7. 

START YOUR GAMEDAY WITH NFL+: 
- Stream live local and primetime regular season and postseason games on phone and tablet. 
- Watch NFL Network 24/7, including seven exclusive games in the 2025 NFL season! 
- Watch ad-free highlights from every game. 
- Listen to live game audio with home, away and national broadcasts for every game of the season. 
- Get NFL Films’ programming and other on-demand content across devices and ad-free. 

NFL+ PREMIUM HAS MORE NFL: 
- Access everything from NFL+ 
- Watch NFL RedZone across devices to catch every touchdown from every game, every Sunday afternoon during the regular season. 
- Relive gameday with game replays including full, condensed, and All-22 coaches' films across devices, all ad-free.  
- Get access to NFL Pro and over 95 unique player and team performance stats and All-22 film for an advanced analytics platform (available on desktop and mobile web).   

Subscription required for NFL+ and NFL+ Premium. Terms and Conditions Apply.  

NFL Network and NFL RedZone are available to stream on an authenticated basis for eligible subscribers of Cox, DirecTV, DISH, Verizon Fios, FuboTV, Hulu + Live TV, Optimum, Sling, Spectrum, Xfinity, YouTubeTV, and more! 

The NFL app allows use of AirPlay when viewing all video-on-demand and select live content. However, the NFL app does not permit outputs from phones or tablets of live games, NFL RedZone or NFL Network to external displays via HDMI, Chromecast, AirPlay, Miracast or other similar streaming functionality. 

Privacy Policy: https://www.nfl.com/legal/privacy

The NBA App is your home for the season.

Get free, instant access to the latest schedule, scores, highlights, news, and behind the scenes stories from across the National Basketball Association.

In the free NBA App, fans get access to:
- Live scores, stats and standings
- The latest basketball news, highlights, game previews and recaps.
- The full season schedule across national and local broadcast partners.*
- Stories from across the NBA to bring you closer to the action.

* National broadcast partners include ABC, ESPN, NBC, Peacock, and Amazon Prime Video. 

Want even more? Watch live games with NBA League Pass and stream your favorite NBA teams and players.

NBA League Pass subscribers have access to:
- Streaming NBA games live and on-demand.**
- Alternate streams including Data Mode and NBA Hoopervision
- Local language broadcasts
- Overlays with player stats, scores of other games, and live odds without leaving the game
- Mobile optimized game streams for phones and tablets

League Pass Premium subscribers get access to:

- In-Arena Entertainment at game breaks, so you feel like you are there.

** Blackouts and restrictions apply in the US and Canada.

NBA ID has rewards for every fan. Sign up and get access to:

Play free games with NBA play to test your basketball knowledge and show how well you know the sport. Games include:
- Full Court Guess
- Hoop Connect

- NBA Rank
- Player Path
- NBA Blast
- Trivia

Get the best free NBA coverage, including pre-season games, global games, NBA Emirates NBA Cup, Christmas Day games, NBA All-Star Weekend and All-Star Game, NBA Playoff games, NBA Finals, NBA Draft, NBA Summer League, and NBA 2K League. The official NBA app features highlights of every shot, dunk, nothing but net, and more from the Atlanta Hawks, Boston Celtics, Brooklyn Nets, Charlotte Hornets, Chicago Bulls, Cleveland Cavaliers, Dallas Mavericks, Denver Nuggets, Detroit Pistons, Golden State Warriors, Houston Rockets, Indiana Pacers, LA Clippers, Los Angeles Lakers, Memphis Grizzlies, Miami Heat, Milwaukee Bucks, Minnesota Timberwolves, New Orleans Pelicans, New York Knicks, Oklahoma City Thunder, Orlando Magic, Philadelphia 76ers, Phoenix Suns, Portland Trail Blazers, Sacramento Kings, San Antonio Spurs, Toronto Raptors, Utah Jazz, and Washington Wizards.

Current NBA League Pass and NBA TV subscribers can access their subscription by logging into the App.

Purchase NBA League Pass or NBA TV, and you will be automatically billed through Apple every 30 days (monthly packages) or every 365 days (annual packages) until you cancel your subscription. Refunds are not available after subscriptions have been activated.

Please visit support.watch.nba.com to contact the support team if you are experiencing any issues.

Welcome to Intuit Dome, home of the LA Clippers and the ultimate Live Entertainment Experience.

The Intuit Dome app gives you seamless access to the venue and allows you to Zoom Thru so you never miss a moment of the action. By creating and completing your profile, you will unlock hassle-free access to parking garages and the venue as well as frictionless shopping across retail and concessions.

Your account is your key to enter Intuit Dome. Set up and complete your profile to enable seamless entry into our parking garages and the arena as well as frictionless shopping throughout the venue.  Zoom Thru and never miss a moment of the action.

Your Intuit Dome profile gives you full access to our Zoom Thru experience throughout the venue. From concessions to retail locations, just grab and go, and never miss a moment of the action.

Navigate Intuit Dome like a pro. The interactive map helps you find the fastest way to get to your seats, and locate concessions, restrooms, and merch shops with ease

Your ultimate live scores and sports news app. Goals, scores, and stories, all on Flashscore. Follow all the latest highlights across the world of sport, including football, tennis, basketball, hockey and much more. Choose from 30+ sports and 6000+ competitions and our tailored notifications will let you know about every important action of the match. 
 
Download Flashscore now and read the game like no one else!

Key features:
• Fastest live results: Get real-time updates with detailed statistics, xG data, unique player and team ratings, live standings and match updates.
• In-depth sports news: Stay informed with exclusive interviews, transfer news & rumours, and in-depth data analysis.
• Personalized favourites: Receive top news notifications, goal alerts, and customized reminders for your favourite teams, competitions or matches.
• Follow your favourite players: Add them to your list and allow notifications so that you never miss their presence in the starting lineup, goals, bookings or ratings.
• Expert match previews: Access selected opportunities and stats to enhance your sports prediction accuracy.
• Predicted lineups: Stay one step ahead and find out who is likely to start in the upcoming match given current form, unexpected injuries or lineup changes.
• Detailed player stats: Check out expected goals (xG), expected assists (xA), the number of shots, passes, touches, chances created, tackles, saves and other key statistics for all the players that appear on the pitch.

LIVE SPORTS SCORES & NEWS, FAST AND ACCURATE

• SPEED: Whether a goal is scored, red card issued, set or period is over, you will know at the same time as the live audience.

• DATA-DRIVEN NEWS: Breaking news and detailed coverage with unique sports data visualizations, tactical insights, expert opinions or featured articles.

• GREAT COVERAGE: You can find football live scores, tennis scores, basketball results, hockey online, golf leaderboard and more than 30 other sports (snooker, baseball, MMA ...) in our app. 


Coverage of major global events & local competitions: 
Football: Premier League, Championship, League One, League Two, FA Cup, LaLiga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Champions League (UCL), Europa League, Europa Conference League, Club World Cup
Tennis: ATP/WTA Tour tournaments including Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), ATP Finals, Davis Cup
Basketball: NBA, Euroleague, ACB, LNB, Lega A, World Cup
Hockey: NHL, DEL, SHL, IIHF World Championship
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam, World Matchplay, UK Open, World Grand Prix
Golf: British Open (The Open), Masters, US Open, PGA Championship, Ryder Cup, Players Championship
Baseball: MLB, KBO, NPB, KBO, LVBP, LMB, World Baseball Classic
Snooker: World Championship, UK Championship, The Masters
Volleyball: SuperLega, Nations League, Nations League Women, CEV Champions League
Badminton: BWF World Championships, Thomas Cup, Uber Cup, Sudirman Cup
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam
Motorsport: Formula 1 (F1), MotoGP, Moto2, Nascar, Dakar
MMA: UFC, Bellator MMA, KSW, Оktagon MMA, PFL, ONE Championship


NO MORE MISSED MATCHES OR UPDATES

• FAVOURITE TEAMS AND MATCHES: Don’t waste your time, and follow only your favourite matches, teams and competitions.

• NOTIFICATIONS AND ALERTS: Match starts, line-ups, goals - you will not miss any of it again. Just select your favorite matches and wait for your mobile device to let you know.


LIVE RESULTS, TABLES AND MATCH DETAILS
